articles.description: BBC Top Gear and Question of Sport host Paddy McGuinness has seen half of his shows cancelled by the BBC
articles.content:
However, both I Can See Your Voice and Catchpoint have been cancelled by the broadcaster, halving the number of shows Paddy will appear on.
A source said: This will come as a real blow to Paddy, who… [+1595 chars]
